refnamediv.refpurpose: List known character set names and aliases.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function produces a list of all character set names and aliases known to Virtuoso. The returned value is an array of strings with a character set name as each element. If the gen_res_set flag is 1, the function also produces a result set in which each row contains one varchar column with a name of a character set or alias.

refsect2.para: Integer flag to determine whether to produce a result set: 0 means no, 1 means yes.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: An array of string, optionally generates a result set of single varchar columns.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: This function can generate the following errors:

example.title: List character sets as a result set
example.para: There are 132 predefined character sets in total that would be listed.

example.title: Get first 2 character set names/aliases
example.programlisting: .... x:= charsets_list (0); y := aref (x, 0); -- will be '437' y := aref (x, 1); -- will be '819' ....
